author: apetrelli
msg: In the URL spaces are converted into %20, while in the file must be spaces.

author: dasarath
msg: The patch changes the kandula.properties contents to include two URLs:
This is the address Kandula will tell any partner when handing out references.
This is the address where Kandula will try to reach a Kandula
activiation service to create new transaction contexts.

msg: added convenience for calling the doRequest method
